dc:title: On Pilgrimage - January 1976
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Three obituaries: Describes her friendship with Helen Iswolsky which began in 1941, living at Tivoli farm, ecumenical activities, and her last illness; Paul Lavalle, a friend and worker with Peter Maurin; Fr. John Kane, a priest near Tivoli.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 566 1976-01-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
